title: Bloom Where You're Planted | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Bloom Where You're Planted | Joel Osteen
description:
If you want to see God open new doors in your life, you have to learn to bloom where you're planted. When you choose to be the best you can be where you are, God will take care of promoting you. 


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
